entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is helping Dumbledore drink the potion. He is described as scooping up a tenth gobletful of potion and feeling the crystal scrape the bottom of the basin (line 9). He is also described as supporting Dumbledore's shoulders and refilling the goblet (lines 11-12).

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one who is drinking the potion. He is described as yelling in anguish and wanting to die (line 14). He is also described as gulping at the goblet and draining every last drop (lines 20-21).

entities.name: potion
entities.description: The potion is the substance that Dumbledore is drinking. It is described as a 'gobletful' of potion (line 9) and Harry scoops up a tenth gobletful of it.

relationships.description: Harry is helping Dumbledore drink the potion. He is described as supporting Dumbledore's shoulders and refilling the goblet (lines 11-12).
Harry is administering the potion to Dumbledore. He is described as scooping up a tenth gobletful of potion and feeling the crystal scrape the bottom of the basin (line 9).
Dumbledore is consuming the potion. He is described as gulping at the goblet and draining every last drop (lines 20-21).
